text: Nadkarni is a surname commonly found in the Indian states of Goa, Karnataka and Maharashtra. Notable people with the surname include: * Bapu Nadkarni (1933–2020), Indian cricketer * Dayanand S. Nadkarni (1910–2000), Indian politician * Nalini Nadkarni (born 1954), American ecologist * Ramesh L. Nadkarni (1921–1995), Hindustani singer *Sucheta Nadkarni (1967–2019), academic in the field of management * Sundar Rao Nadkarni, Indian film actor * Sushil Nadkarni (born 1976), American cricketer * Jayant Ganpat Nadkarni (1931–2018), Admiral in Indian Navy, 14th Chief of the Naval staff Category:Indian family names
title: Nadkarni
